description:
Solar calendar year 2020: grotesque organisms called Others have begun eating people. To take down this new enemy, the Other Suppression Force is formed. Saved by this elite team as a child, psychokinetic Yuito withstands the training to enlist. On the other hand, prodigy Kasane was scouted for her abilities. But Kasane’s dreams tell her strange things, dragging the two into an unavoidable fate.

(Source: Funimation)
synonyms: スカーレットネクサス

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Politics
tags.description: Centers around politics, politicians, or government activities.

tags.name: Dystopian
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a society characterized by poverty, squalor or oppression.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Time Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features time-traveling or other time-warping phenomena.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Assassins
tags.description: Centers around characters who murder people as a profession.

tags.name: Conspiracy
tags.description: Contains one or more factions controlling or attempting to control the world from the shadows.

tags.name: Battle Royale
tags.description: Centers around a fierce group competition, often violent and with only one winner.

tags.name: Espionage
tags.description: Prominently features characters infiltrating an organization in order to steal sensitive information.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

node.description:
The four-piece rock band formed in Nara in 2010. Since its formation, the band has been aggressive in local live performances spread throughout the Kansai region.

Members:
• Takuya Yamanaka (山中 拓也) : Vocal, guitar
• Akira Akirakani (あきらかにあきら) : Bass, chorus
• Shigenobu Suzuki (鈴木 重伸) : Guitar
• Masaya Nakanishi (中西 雅哉) : Drums

(Source: generasia)
Kai Tanaka is a Producer affiliated with BANDAI NAMCO Studios.

_Note: Not to be confused with the [animator and designer](https://anilist.co/staff/147346/Masahiko-Suzuki)._

Started off as a production manager.
